lead_paragraph: The men’s basketball teams in the Big East Conference will play an expanded 18-game schedule in 2007-8. The Big East has not played an 18-game conference schedule since 1998-99.
snippet: The men’s basketball teams in the Big East Conference will play an expanded 18-game schedule in 2007-8. The Big East has not played an 18-game conference schedule since 1998-99.
